Class RolesUtilTest

java.lang.Object
tests.RolesUtilTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) public class RolesUtilTest extends Object
Unit tests for the RolesUtil class.

This test class verifies the correct functionality of various role management operations including role conversion, addition, removal, and checking for roles.

Author:
Dhruv
See Also:
